divs: sighting detailsthe incident i am about to report,took place back in 1997 as previously enteredin the above form. i dont know why i only now am beginning to talk about this(and other incidents). i did try to mention it to others at the time, butrealized no one believed me. i since mentioned it to a few close friends and wasmet with a luke-warm, somewhat-validating responce.around 15 years ago ideveloped more than just an interest about the paranormal\ ufo subject matter.it started as a spin off to the research i was doing in regards to my recoveryfrom alcohol addiction and other health related problems. i ended up in the newage section of the book stores and stumbled on whitley striebers communion, andits been full speed ahead in my research
Summary: Sighting of a craft that first appeared as a star.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Esopus
This sighting has never been favorited.
